item.description:
Join us for a Saturday afternoon trip to the Museum of Fine Arts (MFA). We plan to visit the Chihuly Exhibit, an extraordinary explosion of glass and light.

As well, we will view the four floors of the new New Americas Wing a magnificent addition to our MFA containing some new and old treasures from both continents and four centuries of our own history.

We will make arrangements to dine together afterward when the group meets and expect to eat nearby after the MFA closes at 4:00 p.m.

We plan on going to the Chihuly Glass Exhibit at 1:00 p.m and recommend renting an audio set (cost $6 for nonmembers/$5 for members), which will provide you with information on the Exhibit and selected paintings.

It would be helpful to know if you are an MFA member or a senior (over 65). As an MFA member, will you bring someone in as a guest? With sufficient numbers it may be cheaper to come in at a group rate.

 

MBTA Green Line (E-line)on Huntington Avenue,limited on-street parking; however, there is a parking garage on Museum Road. Garage costs vary depending upon MFA membership and length of stay; maximum $14 for MFA members and $24.00 non-members. Car pooling is recommended.
item.name: A visit to the MFA & the Chihuly "glass fantasy"
